The game is based around designing a base that can withstand the waves of enemies which attack you Welcome to the Base Building Tutorial! In this guide, you will learn the fundamental steps to construct and manage your base efficiently. In order to start the game you need to press the button at the top left corner of the screen, and then click on the fourth icon.
after clicking, you will be greeted by an alert dialog which will ask you what is the difficulty level you want to play at.
after selecting a difficulty level, you will be redirected to the game screen. In the game screen you will have to choose which buildings to build (either the high durability but with no attacking power obelisk or the low durability but with high attacking power lightning tower)
after selecting a building you need to choose where to put it on the board. If you want to return to the building selection you need to press the button at the bottom right corner of the screen. If you want to actually start the game, you need to press the button at top right of the screen, and then the timer will commence.
after that you will have the option of skipping to the next round. at any time if you want to pause the game you can press the button at the left top corner of the screen
here you can change the sound settings
when the timer hits zero, the monsters appear. If the base you built can\'t withstand the monsters, you lose.
The number of points you get is the number of round you survived. eventually, there is a stopping point, but its very hard to get there.
In order to place a building, You need to press the button at the right bottom corner of the screen Now all we ned to do is press the button at the right top corner of the screen and start playing the game You can also press the button at the right top corner of the screen to skip to the next round Additionally, You can also press the button at the left top corner of the screen to pause the game"
Remember, you want to defeat the enemies every round so you have to place your buildings correctly
You have two type of buildings: obelisk and a lightning tower. The obelisk is used to distract monsters because is has a lot of Hp and cannot harm the monsters The Lightning tower is used to damage enemies with lightning bolts from all four sides
